subject: help please
msgSnippet: In the name of ALLAH I am a student in the final year of computer and informatio system and  I have a graduation project about implementing a unit testing tool
messageBody:
In the name of ALLAH
I am a student in the final year of computer and informatio system and I have a graduation project about implementing a unit testing tool with code coverage features, the unit testing tool will be like JUnit testing tool.
please any one can help me in this topic send me
is this a good idea to be implemented?
what knowledge(tools or technology)should we learn to carry out this project?
what are the problems to implement this project?
Note:we are 5 members and work with JAVA.
please reply me soon and also send your comments about any questions that I have not asked.
